title: Indian agri-tech platform nurture.farm collaborates with Google to provide tech-led agriculture solutions - CNBCTV18
content: Indian agri-tech platform nurture.farm collaborates with Google to provide tech-led agriculture solutions  CNBCTV18
description: "With this collaboration with Google, we are working together to develop a scalable, real-time and cost-effective method to measure soil quality," nurture.farm Chief Technology Officer Pranav Tiwari said.
